divs: Sighting DetailsIt all started in summer when i was in bed. I usually looked out the window since my bed was near it. But that night when i looked out the window, some strange lights that appeared and disappeared seemed to be moving about in a certain way. These weren't ordinary lights because they were in the clouds right over the field. These lights took the following sequence: first, they moved like a sort of see saw, i don't know how to spell it. But afterwards, they seemed to move in random directions. This sequence carried on for over 3 days. It stopped soon after and began again the next year. I was amazed about this, but i don't know if i'll see those lights again. During the sequence i thought it were lights from the cars, but i figured out it wasn't. Now i'm wondering if it was an unidentified object, or a UFO.
Summary: Strange lights that seemed to take a certain sequence
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around August 9th 2005
